name: Prize Toy Egg Claw Machine
description:
Easter is approaching and so everyone is excited and waiting for their easter eggs and gifts! But give yourself more fun by collecting various kinds of multiple egg surprises from this customized and special easter egg surprise claw machine! Enjoy a new treat with every new claw machine and this time have fun with the newest easter special!

Download this easter egg claw machine game which welcomes you in your smartphones! It has multiple easter eggs which have multiple toy surprises in them just for you! Play this game to release some stress and your kids a fun game to play!

Provide yourself with happiness by gifting yourself all the colorful and your favorite easter egg surprises! These surprise eggs include so many toys inside! From action figures to cartoons to superheroes to dolls, everything! So rid yourself of a tiresome routine and relieve stress by playing this fun prize game and reward yourself with the necessary treats! This fun free game for kids can be played by anyone!

Look forward to revealing for yourself a new surprise and toy everyday and reveal to yourself a brand new egg surprise! Add multiple easter eggs and toy surprise to your collection of all different colors with a new and always exciting gift for you inside! Just pop the surprise egg in the machine game and the toy surprise is yours!

Play the game for free and collect dozens of easter eggs which would normally cost you but these won’t! So, this game provides a good hold on your budget so you can save!! What is easter without yummy and pretty egg surprise toys?!! So, give yourself and your kids a treat you’ll enjoy forever while cherishing the attraction and addiction of the fun claw machine!

You’re sure to love the simplest game play ever! Since this is a claw machine all you have to do is access and control the claw machine and grab the easter egg of your choice! Not only does this toy egg game have numerous amounts of eggs and surprises to choose from collect, for more exciting additions of features it also has a crane claw machine operating control to help you get the egg surprise of your choice!

Once you download the game you will be redirected to the game play mode! There on the vending machine like claw machine, inside of it will be a grabbing crane with the help of which you will control the movements of the grabber, aim at your favorite easter egg and grab it! Once you have successfully grabbed at the toy egg, hold it tight and drag it to the claw machine opening, drop it and the collect the egg from there!

After receiving the toy egg you can simply tap on it to pop it and once you have popped it you will receive a brand new toy to play with and add to your easter egg collection!!
Play as many times as you want, you will enjoy the same with each play!
All the kids will be so exited to play this game since it is a fun free game for kids with hundred percent guaranteed fun!

|||| HOW TO PLAY Prize Toy Egg Claw Machine:
• Begin for playing the game
• Use the onscreen controls to drag the claw machine crane grabber inside machine
• Drop the grabber inside the prize machine
• Aim at one easter egg
• Grab onto that egg to bring it out using buttons on the machine
• Collect all eggs and save them in surprise egg collection
• Tap on the egg to pop and receive candies and chocolates as gifts!
• Collect all easter eggs!

|||| FEATURES OF Prize Toy Egg Claw Machine:
• Easter special themed game
• Claw machine simulation
• Fun sound effects and graphics
• Multiple levels
• Storing space for all collected eggs
• Simple onscreen controls
• Crane grabber simulation
